author: Bajan
comment: I really enjoy the capability this app provides in displaying my Nixon mission watch sensors through complications. Thanks, and well done!

author: Andy Serwatuk
comment: I love this app. Only decent way to make use of the sensors in my Nixon mission.

author: D Schrader
comment: Jun17- I love the update to use complications. Being able to see these readings easily is why I got this watch./ I wanted an app that could read all the sensors and display the readings directly on the watch. This was the only app I found that did that and it works well.

author: Piers Marchington
comment: Just downloaded the app would be nice to have a more user friendly interface (I'm not much of a computer guy) but tbh I'm so glad someone has finally let me use the thermometer on my Nixon mission so thank You very much 😁

author: Cagdas D. SON
comment: Very nice, hope a better GUI can be included. This app can do more then many that are sold.

author: Rachel Padden
comment: I was really impressed with this app, as far as I can tell the information is very extensive and accurate. It might be a bit much for the majority of Android users but it should be indispensable for anyone considering developing for Android Wear!
title: Very Impressive App!
